h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Back on the main path, be wary of Frozen Corpses that you'll find littered around this area. As the gorge path opens up, you can spy an even bigger pagoda than the one you just escape from high up above you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Outside the Wheel'.
The content is as follows:
Back on the main path, be wary of Frozen Corpses that you'll find littered around this area. As the gorge path opens up, you can spy an even bigger pagoda than the one you just escape from high up above you.
